alert.note: Alert for Magoffin; Menifee; Morgan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 12:22PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF MENIFEE...MAGOFFIN...MORGAN... AND WOLFE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of 20 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1221 PM EST, a snow squall was over Ezel, or 9 miles west of West Liberty moving southeast at 25 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... West Liberty, Henry, Payton, Pekin, Murphyfork, Daysboro, New Cummer, Rexville, Grassy Creek, and Maytown around 1225 PM EST. Lewis, Helechawa, Lower Gilmore, and Well Station around 1230 PM EST. Lee City around 1235 PM EST. THIS INCLUDES Bert T. Combs Mountain Parkway between mile markers 56 and 69. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
